en: Your product is key when it comes to this upcoming meeting with Dominique Martel. You've made progress with it, but mostly with the guts - you haven't yet started to polish it up and make it really presentable. Several core functions are missing, and you're not sure whether you should spend time making thing prettier, or expanding the core function.
You polish the surface, hoping Mr. Martel will be excited by the hint of a final product.

You work on adding more function. It still looks like something a college student might've thrown together on a whim, but you hope seeing how it functions will help Mr. Martel know what it's capable of.
